participant_2.background:
I never finished high school.
I just had surgery.
I have two large dogs.
I eat sardines for breakfast daily.
I love playing frisbee.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for a living?
I'm a stay at home mom to two large dogs.
Oh, how fun! I love dogs. What are their names?
Their names are Buster and Bailey.
Those are great names! Do you like playing frisbee with them?
I love playing frisbee with them! It's so much fun.
I've never played frisbee with dogs before. It sounds like it would be a lot of fun.
It is! You should try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion. So, what do you do for fun when you're not playing frisbee with your dogs?
I love to read and watch movies. I also like to go to the park with my dogs.
Those are all great things to do. I love to read and watch movies too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like mysteries and thrillers.
I love mysteries and thrillers too! What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling. I also like the Agatha Christie mysteries and the Stephen King novels.
Those are all great books! I love the Harry Potter series too. I've read them all multiple times.
I've read them all multiple times too! They're so good.
I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Harry Potter!
Me too! It's one of my favorite series.
